Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix number keys not working in hotkey capture fields

The hotkey capture UI used Keys.D6.ToString\(\) which produced "D6", but
KeyboardService.VKToName produced "6" - so number-key hotkeys silently
failed to match. Also added PreviewKeyDown handler for Alt combinations
and NumPad key support.
